name: Webaholic
tag_list: web-solutions, web-development, graphic-design, logo-design, flash-design, brochure-design, corporate-identity-design
overview:
Webaholic is a web solution provider based in Kolkata, India to serve you with custom website design, custom website development, website redesign, logo design, flash design and graphics design, E-Commerce Website design.

We believe in providing custom Website Design Solutions, Web Development, E-Commerce Website to global companies at affordable prices and our goal is customer satisfaction.

We strongly believe that good web design is only the beginning of an effective website strategy. Effective web promotion completes the package. Webaholic provides you with a full range of web promotion services designed to get your website noticed.

Webaholic takes a fair and honest approach and conduct our business under the highest ethical and professional standards. Remember, our job is to make your job easy.

Exposure is what the Internet is all about. But how much of it you attain depends on how well you present yourself or your company. With millions of individuals and companies setting up residence on the Internet on a daily basis, you need to set your personal home site or business site apart from the rest.

If you wish to stand out from the mundane crowd, if you want your business to succeed, if you want to own a Website that is clearly distinctive, and you just don’t have the time, the energy, or the know-how to do so, Webaholic is your solution.

offices.address1: 33/22A Raja Subodh Chandra Mullick Road, Jadavpur
